text: Digau o di waahale Nineveh gu hagadonu nnelekai a God, malaa, digaula guu donu ginai bolo nia daangada huogodoo gi haga hiigai ina ginaadou, mai digau aamua gaa tugi i digau ala lligi. Digaula huogodoo gii gahu i nia gahu haga manawa gee, e haga modongoohia aga di nadau huli hoou.3.5 Matthew 12.41; Luke 11.32
